ARABIC: ذَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيْدِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is your reward. Allah always confounds the schemes of the kuffar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That was that, but remember God will make the plots of the unbelievers contemptible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is His manner of dealing with you. As for the unbelievers, Allah will surely undermine their designs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is how God causes the (evil) plans of the unbelievers to fail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore take this, and (know that) Allah will weaken the scheme of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This (is the fact) and surely Allah weakens the deceitful plots of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This, and that Allah is the weakener of the struggle of the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That for you; and that God weakens the unbelievers' guile.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That (is the case); and (know) that Allah (it is) Who maketh weak the plan of disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that is what happened, and God will surely undermine the design of those who deny the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus! And know that Allah weakenoth the contrivance of infidels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Such is the case, and [know] that Allah undermines the stratagems of the faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That, and also because Allah is He Who makes feeble the plans and stratagem of the Unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This (is the fact) and surely, Allah weakens the deceitful plots of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah will surely weaken the guile of the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Such is the case. God will undermine the strategy of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That [is so], and [also] that Allah will weaken the plot of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:18] That is, the true gift, for you, and [know] that God weakens the plan of the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That) victory and spoils of war are for you; (and (know) that Allah (it is) Who maketh weak the plan of disbelievers) He weakens the disbelievers's plans.
